briefTitle: Safety and Tolerability Trial of Switching From Ropinirole to Rotigotine
officialTitle: A Phase 3b, Open-Label, Multicenter Trial to Assess the Safety and Tolerability of Switching Korean Subjects From Ropinirole to the Rotigotine Transdermal System and Its Effect on Symptoms in Idiopathic Parkinson's Disease
summary: This is a Phase 3b, open-label, multicenter trial to assess the safety and tolerability of switching from ropinirole therapy to the rotigotine transdermal system and its effect on symptoms in subjects with idiopathic Parkinson's disease

primaryOutcome.measure: Change in Pulse Rate (Supine, After 1 Minute)
